articles.headline: Wrestling giants
articles.summary: The investigation explores the business strategies of Columbia/HCA, a major healthcare provider, analyzing its Medicare billing practices and cost structures, revealing higher costs for patient care.

articles.headline: Sudden Seizures
articles.summary: An investigation into the misuse of drug forfeiture money by a Louisiana sheriff's department, uncovering illegal expenditures like luxury ski trips funded by seized money.

articles.headline: System protecting military malpractice
articles.summary: The report uncovers systemic issues in the military health care system that protect negligent practices, highlighting lack of malpractice insurance for military doctors.

articles.headline: Undeserved overtime
articles.summary: The investigation reveals a widespread scam by officers in South Florida to exploit court overtime pay by adding their names to arrest reports unjustly.
